questList.questDescription: Restore balance in the Shadows of Despair by either eliminating or uniting with one of the Ethereal Nightmares.
Seek out and unite with the Spectral Void Wraith, Phantomshade, to harness its healing powers.
Defeat the Ethereal Shadow Stalker, Darkwhisper, to earn the amulet of alliance.
Decide the fate of the Illusory Trickster, Mysticwhisper, by either joining forces or putting an end to its deception.
Unite with the Ethereal Forest Guardian, Willowshade, to receive the amulet of healing and protection.
Defeat the Siren of the Depths, Abyssal Songstress, to claim the amulet of alliance and silence her haunting melodies.
Confront the Nethermourn, the Ethereal Void Stalker, in a final battle to claim victory and bring light to the Void's Embrace.
Unite with the Frostbound Wraith, Iceveil Wraith, to receive the amulet of healing and soothe the icy chill of the void.
Defeat the Rotten Ghoul Hound, Blighted Fleshhound, to earn the amulet of alliance and cleanse the void of its putrid presence.
